maxFilesError: You can upload a maximum of 20 files.

resumeAnalysis.title: Resume Analysis
resumeAnalysis.description: Upload candidate resumes and select vacancies for AI matching.

uploadResumes.label: Upload Resumes
uploadResumes.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here or click to select
uploadResumes.fileRequirements: PDF files, up to 5MB each, maximum 20 files.

additionalNotes.label: Additional Comments (optional)
additionalNotes.placeholder: For example: 'Pay attention to candidates with fintech experience...'

cost.title: Analysis Cost
cost.description: The cost will be calculated based on the number and volume of resumes and deducted from your organization's token balance.

result.title: Analysis Result
result.inviteCreatedDesc: Candidate added to funnel. Send them this link to register:

whatIs.title: What is this?
whatIs.description: AI will create a personalized document based on candidate profile, test results, and vacancy description. The document can be edited and sent to the candidate.

additionalInfo.label: Additional Information
additionalInfo.hint: For example: interview date, salary conditions, special requests

generateInterview.processingDescription: AI is analyzing test results and composing questions...
generateInterview.title: Generate Structured Interview Plan
generateInterview.description: AI will create a detailed structured interview plan based on candidate's full analysis and vacancy requirements.

whatIs.title: What is this?
whatIs.description: Structured interview is created based on psychometric data. AI will suggest specific questions to verify risks and strengths of the candidate.

additionalInfo.placeholder: For example: Focus on team management experience or stress resilience testing

generateInterview.confirmation: Are you sure you want to generate interview plan? This will deduct tokens from your organization's balance.
generateInterview.successDescription: Structured interview plan was successfully generated and saved.

compareCandidates.title: Compare Candidates
compareCandidates.description: Select 2-10 candidates for AI comparison. Only candidates who completed all 6 tests are available.
compareCandidates.errorProfile: Failed to fetch HR profile or organization.
compareCandidates.processingDescription: AI is analyzing profiles and creating detailed comparison...

whatIs.title: Why compare candidates?
whatIs.description: AI will conduct deep analysis across all parameters and recommend the best hire.

compareCandidates.incomplete: Unavailable for comparison (not all tests completed)

errors.missingData: Failed to fetch candidate, HR, or organization data.
